MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.59pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because difficult weather conditions onsite and the requirement for further fault investigations. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:53pm on Tuesday, 09 March 2021
